annonsrubrik: Wiring Harness Engineer for assignments within automotive
annonstext:
We are now looking for experienced Wiring Harness Engineers to work with electrical schematics and 3D packaging design at ALTEN in Stockholm!

As a consultant at ALTEN, you will be a part of our cable harness team and work with assignments within schematics and routing. The work involves collaboration with many cross functional groups which requires good communicative skills to succeed. The role gives you the opportunity to work in the whole development process and in an international environment.

We are looking for you who have a Masters- or Bachelor’s degree within a relevant field, e.g. Electrical- or Mechanical engineering.

Required competence:
• +2 years of relevant experience
• Saber ESD/Zuken
• Mechanical Engineering
• Catia V5 + Cabling or CREO + Cabling
• Automotive Experience
• European citizenship

About ALTEN
ALTEN is a global consulting company that delivers expertise for world-leading companies. We are located in over 30 countries and have more than 37 000 employees.
In Sweden, we have over 1 800 employees and offices in twelve locations across the country. Our clients are found in industries such as Automotive, Energy, Telecom, Industry, Aerospace & Defense and Life Science.

Benefits
Work life balance is our top priority. A very appreciated benefit is our Work Life Balance Days, which are off-days complimentary provided by the company throughout the year to promote a healthy work life. We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.

We look forward to your application!
